title: Will I be punish by LeaverBuster ?
body: I was playing a match then I got disconnect by an updating patch. I tried to reconnect but the launcher say it "Unavailable" . I'm so worry right now

replies.body: You will not be punished for losing connection to this game.
Oh thank you ! Can you play it now ? I think it is my laptop problem
It wasn't a problem with your laptop, the servers were taken offline to deploy Patch 6.14. The deployment has completed and the servers are up again so patch and play!

In addition, you can always check the [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) if you're curious if maintenance is going on.

Let me know if you have any questions.
